item.title: Project Jupyter
item.description: Installing Jupyter Jupyter requires a prequisite of Python version 2.7 or version 3.3 and greater. The recommended installation method is to use the Anaconda distribution which will install Python and Jupyter. Running Jupyter Notebook Run the following command to run Jupyter Notebook jupyter notebook Installing JupyterLab JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project Jupyter. JupyterLab can be installed using either conda, pip or, pipenv. conda conda install -c conda-forge jupyterlab pip pip install jupyterlab pipenv pipenv install jupyterlab pipenv shell Running JupyterLab JupyterLab can be run with the following command:
